name: Star Ping Pong
overview: An unreleased Ping Pong game from Cool Productions in 1991. John Smith is an average player. Who wants to test his luck this year. To be able to take the trophy with you. he has to face difficult opponents! The preliminary round consists of eight games. The games are decided according to the knockout system, followed by the main round with the remaining seven games. The first player to reach 7 points wins, the game is over and you get an additional 500 points.
